Articles.Content:
Alright here is my first rocket proposal

The STK Rocket family (tsSKB Progress Super heavy Launch Vehicle)

http://www.russianspaceweb.com/images/rockets/stk/family_1.jpg

Manned|Cargo

payload 85 Tons 130T 165T 180T 85T 130T 190T (all on order of the rockets showed above)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Manned Rocket is meant to carry the PPTS

http://www.russianspaceweb.com/images/spacecraft/ppts/ptknp_2009_leo_sunrise_1.jpg

All other launch vehicles are meant to carry Space Station parts into LEO(LKO)

or into mars/Duna orbit

Pretty cool

- - - Updated - - -

It's cool, you working on their Apollo program? In any case, I would like to use your LRV for my addon. I'll wait, great job !!!

Sure thing.
where can I download the x-15, astrovan, x37b?

I would like to ask a question, how do I attach the space shuttle to the crawler so that it can be used for launch? I cant seem to figure out how to set it up. If anyone could let me know this I was appreciate it.

I would like to ask a question, how do I attach the space shuttle to the crawler so that it can be used for launch? I cant seem to figure out how to set it up. If anyone could let me know this I was appreciate it.

The floating attach node is a decoupler. It goes to node between engines on shuttle

- - - Updated - - -

where can I download the x-15, astrovan, x37b?

X15 not 100% ready for download. Triston has x37. Astrovan in download page one

The floating attach node is a decoupler. It goes to node between engines on shuttle

Thanks! This will be a very useful thing for launch images

This is my personal opinion but I think the XB70 is a little overpowered. I'm pushing 800+ m/s at 5,000 meters. Easiest way to fix this would to possibly lower the thrust on the engines, considering that there are more than 5 on it. Unless it is SUPPOSED to be this way than so be it, this is just my opinion.

I am also running pretty much stock aero, only other mods I have installed are the shuttle pack, ISS pack, KJR, and Kerbal engineer.

Edited September 15, 2015 by Noname115
Extra information

Ok.

For now you could use less throttle

- - - Updated - - -

I had night off last night so no work done.

With all these new ideas, can we put them into groups in a list? Easier to work with and keep packs seperate.
I agreebwith that idea, mike! Hey btw, take a look,at the op of the main ssp thread. We have a new, rather famous member on our team.

Ok.

For now you could use less throttle

- - - Updated - - -

I had night off last night so no work done.

With all these new ideas, can we put them into groups in a list? Easier to work with and keep packs seperate.

What kind of seperate addon packs would u suggest? Maybe make new topics in dev thread? Or just keep it in here, then i might make some new lists
Addons here. Shuttle pack on shuttle thread
Do the crawlers raise the MLP now?

Not in the download version. I want to put some different code in there first

- - - Updated - - -

What kind of seperate addon packs would u suggest? Maybe make new topics in dev thread? Or just keep it in here, then i might make some new lists

I was thinking different catagories.

Payloads.

Russian parts

Russian proposed vehicles

American proposed vehicles

Aircraft

Ground vehicles.

Just to keep things organised

- - - Updated - - -

I have been speaking with DECQ about his Buran. It will be completely independent of ssp and its addon packs. However, if he wants to make buran compatible with our payloads, it's his perogative. I will not argue so long as our payloads do not show up in his pack other than a link.

I would like to see them compatible with his buran. I will have to make them look better first tho...

- - - Updated - - -

Mike-NZ;2198161]Link added to page one.

You want me to sort out the x38 and send to you?

Yes that would be great

Yes that would be great

I second that request.

I have an idea (oh no...)

What about a payload item

That...

Enables FTL or warp drive of some sort...

Would be a fun scifi addon for taking the shuttle way beyond.

Sounds like a neat idea. Could be fun to have an inter-planetary shuttle, deploying satellites in Laythe orbit. On a side note, do you think KSP 1.1 will break SSP? Do you think Unity 5 will cause mods to be incompatible? I am unaware if Squad has said anything about this, I am just worried 60% of all mods breaking on release day.

Sounds like a neat idea. Could be fun to have an inter-planetary shuttle, deploying satellites in Laythe orbit. On a side note, do you think KSP 1.1 will break SSP? Do you think Unity 5 will cause mods to be incompatible? I am unaware if Squad has said anything about this, I am just worried 60% of all mods breaking on release day.

You can guarantee on the day I would be ready, I may now run the shuttle and larger parts through unity 5 3d editor now in preporation, and do some reading.

Hoping its not too bad. At worst it will be like how it was when I took over months ago. But now I know alot more than I did, which was nothing back then haha

I have an idea (oh no...)

What about a payload item

That...

Enables FTL or warp drive of some sort...

Would be a fun scifi addon for taking the shuttle way beyond.

I'll leave you to do what you will with that as a sort of pet project (like what i am doing in ksp itself for triston)
